item.description:
Please join us for an introductery workshop on Biodynamic treatments for fruit trees.  You will learn about late winter treatments to prevent spring damage from larval pests. These treatments will also provide nutrients to the trees for improved growth.

This will be a hands-on workshop so be prepared with appropriate clothing, gloves and footwear.

There is a suggested fee of $5 per person. No one will be denied access to this workshop for lack of funds. Please conatct me through this site for alternate arrangements.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the front door and ring the bell in the inner porch
item.why: We should do this because we want to eat the fruit rather that feed it to bugs.
item.name: Biodynamic Treatments for Fruit Trees
